attributes.action: give the people a chance to vote on a second referendum, EU in or out
attributes.additional_details: Many people did not realise the effects on leaving the EU, a lot of people now feel they could have made a mistake, a two part referendum would answer this question and give a final definite response to the government. This is not about Brexiteers or remoaners its about maybe getting it right and possibly correcting a wrong
attributes.background:
give us a chance to vote on a second referendum for the UK in the EU. Have a two part referendum to save money
Question 1. do you agree a second EU refendum should be held. YES.....NO
In the event of question 1 returning a majority yes vote. how would you vote concerning the EU. Leave......Stay
